p: DOT estimates were obtained from Cramer et al. [ 23], using the T δ−SL record (based on subtracting New Jersey sea-level estimates from a benthic δ 18O stack) for the interval 9–65 Ma, and the scaled δ 18O record for the interval 0–9 Ma, with their interpolation at 0.1 Myr resolution. The SCOR and DOT data are available in the electronic supplementary material.
